title: Franconia Ridge Loop
summary: Iconic White Mountains loop over Little Haystack, Lincoln, and Lafayette with big alpine views.

title: Pemi Loop Lite
summary: Shortened Pemigewasset backpack linking Franconia Ridge, Garfield, and the Twins.

title: Carter-Moriah Traverse
summary: North-to-south crossing of the Carter-Moriah Range with Presidential views.

title: Wildcat-Carters-Moriah Linkup
summary: Full Pinkham-to-Gorham traverse stacking Wildcats, Carters, and Moriah.

title: Bonds from Lincoln Woods
summary: Out-and-back to Bondcliff, Bond, and West Bond via the Lincoln Woods approach.

title: Presidential Range Day Skyline
summary: Ambitious single-day southbound traverse over the Southern Presidentials.

title: Great Range Day Push
summary: Fast traverse of Gothics, Saddleback, Basin, and Haystack in one go.

title: Great Range Overnight
summary: Two-day Great Range plan with a night in Johns Brook Valley.

title: Wolfjaws Loop
summary: Loop over Lower and Upper Wolfjaw from the Garden as a Great Range sampler.

title: Seward Range Traverse
summary: Remote Adirondack herd-path linkup of Seward, Donaldson, and Emmons.

title: High Peaks Canoe & Carry Loop
summary: Packraft-friendly circuit connecting Henderson Lake and the Preston Ponds.

title: Saranac Lake Chains Canoe Route
summary: Island-hopping paddle through the Saranac lake chain with short carries.

title: Cranberry Lake 50 Lakeside Section
summary: Two-day backpack on mellow CL50 shoreline segments with plentiful camps.

title: Pharaoh Lake Loop
summary: Family-friendly circuit around Pharaoh Lake with lean-tos and beaches.

title: Long Trail: Lincoln Gap to Appalachian Gap
summary: Ridgeline Long Trail day over Abraham, Lincoln Peak, and Ellen.

title: Long Trail: Killington to Middlebury Gap
summary: Multi-day LT segment through Pico, Brandon Gap, and Breadloaf Wilderness.

title: Long Trail: Stratton to Manchester Center
summary: Southern LT stretch over Stratton and Bromley with easy town access.

title: Long Trail: Camel's Hump Day Loop
summary: Loop to Camel's Hump combining Burrows ascent with Forest City descent.

title: Long Trail: Mount Mansfield Ridge Walk
summary: Alpine traverse across Vermont's highest summit from Underhill to the Notch.

title: Long Trail: Jay Peak to Hazen's Notch
summary: Northern LT ridge walk over Jay Peak toward Hazen's Notch Road.

title: Katahdin Hamlin & Baxter Peaks Loop
summary: Roaring Brook loop tagging Hamlin Ridge and Baxter Peak via the Saddle.

title: Katahdin Knife Edge Traverse
summary: Exposed traverse from Pamola across the Knife Edge to Baxter Peak.

title: Baxter Basin Falls Tour
summary: Relaxed outing to Chimney Pond, Basin Ponds, and Sandy Stream Pond.

title: Traveler Loop (Baxter North)
summary: Remote loop over Traveler Mountain and neighboring peaks from South Branch.
